description: This software is honestly remarkable. Setup wasn't that difficult, the installation guide is straightforward, and the mobile+desktop apps work so smoothly once the server is fully set up. Up and running on phone and laptop within 30 minutes of starting the installation guide!

So while this is a cool idea and looks lovely, and even looks great on my linux phone; any app that has dependencies on a $2000+ laptop / desktop; is compleately worthless to myself and countless other poor people around the world ( You know, half of Linux's consumer-base ).
very cool app for folks who like to tinker.
Works like a charm for most of the time; sometimes the app crashes and tells me to reinstall; closing it and opening it seems to fix that.

Most of the time I'm working from a desktop Mac, but I have a few Linux laptops. With very little time invested in setup, this makes it possible to keep up with Messages from those devices when I'm not at my desk. 

It has a few UI and functionality glitches with Debian 12/GNOME.
Works great to send iMessages from my Ubuntu devices, without the pitfalls or weird bugs involved with AirMessage. Could not rate highly enough!

Very useful (and remarkable, really!) app. Installed it on Win 10 and 11 machines and 5 
Linux distros. No problems that Co-Pilot couldn't handle (another useful app). 
Thanks for BlueBubbles!
